summary: Call the update method for all the registered components.

parameters.name: elapsedTime
parameters.description: The time in milliseconds that has passed since the game started.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The time in fractional seconds since the last iteration of the game loop.

remarks: The update method shouldn't need to be called manually as it is automatically called for all registered layers.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
